channel.title: Old Mutual Wealth - Celebrating Women
channel.managingEditor: old-mutual-wealth@solidgold.co.za (Old Mutual Wealth | Solid Gold Podcasts #BeHeard)
channel.copyright: © Old Mutual Wealth - all rights reserved
channel.description:
Take your wealth further. Together, today.

Professional advice can help you stay focused on what really matters.

Define your world, your way. Meaningful wealth management is about much more than just money. It’s about how you see yourself. The impact you want to make. The legacy you want to leave. Your priorities for today and tomorrow. At Old Mutual Wealth we offer no generalist solutions. Together with your financial planner, our team of experienced specialists go to great lengths to understand what really drives you. Once we know your priorities, we model a strategy around your specific needs supported by a multi-skilled team dedicated to taking your wealth further.

another https://SolidGold.co.za podcast #BeHeard

item.title: Old Mutual - Celebrating Women | Kelly de Kock (Chief Operating Officer | Old Mutual Wealth)
item.itunes:title: Old Mutual - Celebrating Women | Kelly de Kock (Chief Operating Officer | Old Mutual Wealth)
item.itunes:subtitle: In celebration of Women’s Month
item.description:
Old Mutual - Celebrating Women — In celebration of Women’s Month Kelly de Kock (Chief Operating Officer | Old Mutual Wealth) Listen to Kelly de Kock, Chief Operating Officer for International and Private Client Capabilities at Old Mutual Wealth, celebrating women and delving into the new way of thinking about women in leadership roles. Kelly also talks about the damaging effects of unconscious bias and how men can help change this.


Connect with Kelly on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/kelly-de-kock-1a59934/

Music : https://JohnBartmann.com


Old Mutual Wealth https://www.oldmutual.co.za/wealth


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za

Kelly also talks about the damaging effects of unconscious bias and how men can help change this.

item.title: Celebrating Women | Pat Magadla (Senior Business Development Manager | Old Mutual Investment Group)
item.itunes:title: Celebrating Women | Pat Magadla (Senior Business Development Manager | Old Mutual Investment Group)
item.itunes:subtitle: Celebration of Women’s Month
item.description:
Celebrating Women — Celebration of Women’s Month Pat Magadla (Senior Business Development Manager | Old Mutual Investment Group) In celebration of Women’s Month, listen to Pat Magadla, Senior Business Development Manager at Old Mutual Investment Group, as she shares her views on diversity, women’s empowerment and leadership roles in her inspirational talk encouraging the next generation of leaders.


Connect with Pat on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/in/pat-magadla-cfp%C2%AE-85ab66122/

Music : https://JohnBartmann.com


Old Mutual Wealth https://www.oldmutual.co.za/wealth


When you're ready to #BeHeard, contact the podcast specialists at SolidGold.co.za
